protein.specific_function: Participates in the detoxification of a plethora of hydrazine and arylamine drugs. Catalyzes the N- or O-acetylation of various arylamine and heterocyclic amine substrates and is able to bioactivate several known carcinogens.

go_class.description: transferase activity, transferring acyl groups other than amino-acyl groups
